sect1.title: Build Flags
sect1.para: We will need to setup target specific flags for the compiler and linkers.

screen.userinput: export LFS_TARGET32="`echo ${LFS_TARGET} | sed -e 's/64//g'`" export BUILD32="-mabi=n32" export BUILD64="-mabi=64"

sect1.para: Lets add the build flags to ~/.bashrc to prevent issues if we stop and come back later.

screen.userinput: echo export LFS_TARGET32=\""${LFS_TARGET32}\"" >> ~/.bashrc echo export BUILD32=\""${BUILD32}\"" >> ~/.bashrc echo export BUILD64=\""${BUILD64}\"" >> ~/.bashrc
